name: Infinite Bubble Shooter
description:
It is the best bubble shooting game I have played. Set space theme, full of challenge and shoot swiftly ect...
Three more same bubbles together will disappear. The more bubbles disappear, the more scores you get.

Two wonderful game modes for you to choose: with endless mode, you can get endless playing; Of course,
if you like to play it level by level, 60 levels is already waiting for you!

Once you play the game, you love it.
